DynamicEnumProperty.Name: RemoteDebugTarget
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: The target machine or device to use for deploy and debug.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: RemoteDebuggingTarget
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: The target machine or device to use for deploy and debug.

EnumProperty.Name: DebuggerType
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies which code type to debug.

StringProperty.Name: PreLaunchCommand
StringProperty.Description: A command that is run on the shell before the debugging starts and before the debugger is running, and can be used to affect the debugging environment.

StringProperty.Name: RemoteDebuggerCommand
StringProperty.Description: The full path to the program to debug on the remote system. This is a path on the remote system. If left empty or unchanged it defaults to the current project output.

StringProperty.Name: RemoteDebuggerCommandArguments
StringProperty.Description: The command line arguments to pass to the program being debugged.

StringProperty.Name: RemoteDebuggerWorkingDirectory
StringProperty.Description: The remote application's working directory. By default, the project output directory on the remote system.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalDebuggerCommands
StringListProperty.Description: Additional gdb commands for the debugger to run before starting debugging.

StringProperty.Name: LocalPortNumber
StringProperty.Description: The port number for debugger communication with the remote debugger. The port must not be in use locally. This value must be positive in between 1 and 65535. If not supplied a free port number will be used.

StringProperty.Name: RemotePortNumber
StringProperty.Description: The port number on which the remote debugger server (gdbserver) is listening on on the remote system. The port must not be in use on the remote system. This value must be positive in between 1 and 65535. If not supplied a free port number starting from 4444 will be used.

EnumProperty.Name: RemoteDebuggingMode
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies how the debugger interfaces with gdb. In the gdb mode the debugger drives gdb over the shell on the remote system. In the gdbserver mode, gdb is running locally and connects to gdbserver running remotely.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalSymbolSearchPaths
StringListProperty.Description: Additional search path for debug symbols (solib-search-path).

BoolProperty.Name: DebugChildProcesses
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether to enable debugging of child processes.

StringProperty.Name: RemoteGDBPath
StringProperty.Description: Path to the gdb (or lldb) executable: in 'gdbserver' mode a local Windows path, in 'gdb' mode a linux path on the remote target.

BoolProperty.Name: EnablePrettyPrinting
BoolProperty.Description: Enable pretty printing of expression values. Only supported in "gdb" debugging mode.

StringProperty.Name: LinuxNatvisFile
StringProperty.Description: Default native visualization file (.natvis) containing visualization directives for SLT types. Other .natvis files that belong to the current solution will be loaded automatically.

StringListProperty.Name: SourceMap
StringListProperty.Description: Additional path equivalences for the debugger to use to map Windows source file names to Linux source file names. Format is "<windows-path>=<linux-path>;...". A source file name found under the Windows path will be referenced as if is has been found in the same relative position under the Linux path. Files found in the local project do not require additional mapping.

BoolProperty.Name: ShowDisplayString
BoolProperty.Description: Enable showing the natvis DisplayString element by default in the locals, watch, datatips, etc.

EnumProperty.Name: LoadAllSymbols
EnumProperty.Description: When loading all symbols the symbols for solibs in Symbol List are not loaded. When only loading symbols for specific solibs then Symbol List specifies those solibs.

EnumValue.Name: enabled
EnumValue.DisplayName: Load all symbols except those in Symbol List

EnumValue.Name: disabled
EnumValue.DisplayName: Load only those symbol specified in Symbol List

StringListProperty.Name: SymbolLoadList
StringListProperty.Description: List of semi-colon separated solib names (wildcards allowed). See Symbol Loading Preference.

StringListProperty.Name: ASANRuntimeFlags
StringListProperty.Description: Runtime flags passed to AddressSanitizer via the ASAN_OPTIONS environment variable.

EnumProperty.Name: MIMode
EnumProperty.Description: Indicates whether to use gdb or lldb for debugging.
